statement.tex: \text{Differentiate the following function}\\ \text{with respect to x}\\ \quad f(x) = \sin (x^2 + 5)

step.context: \text{If g(x) and h(x) be two functions such that}\\ g(x) = \sin x \text{ and } h(x) = x^2 + 5,\text{ then }f(x) = ?
step.reason: (g\circ h)(x) = g(h(x)) = \sin(h(x)) = \sin(x^2+5) = f(x).\\ (h\circ g)(x) = h(g(x)) = h(\sin x) = \sin^2 x + 5 \neq f(x).\\ \text{Just wanted to see if you're comfortable}\\ \text{with the notation.}
